mosinstall.name: rhuk_solarflare_ii
mosinstall.author: rhuk
mosinstall.description: SolarFlare II is a simple and stylish template. The clean design of this template makes it very lightweight and fast. This is a significatn upgrade for the original SolarFlare template in that is has a completely revised layout that uses an alternate box model hack that makes it easier to modify. Also a table has been introduced in the main content area that better constricts layout causing less problems with 'problematic' components. New headers and menu elements give this template a 'fresher' look.
